Name: Chetz!
About the game: Chetz! is a hardcore platformer, made in the spirit of classic platormers. This is the first chess-based platformer ever in the world! You get to play as beloved chess characters. You have seen them on the board before, now get ready to take control of them in the game! Through any means, defeat the opposing king and reclaim your title as a Chetz! master.
